text.name: sys_description
text.text: The idea was to start from scratch to completely rethink a new system, always in collaboration with Lockheed Martin, who designed the Twin Real3D/Pro-1000 graphics microprocessors. It will be equipped with a 66 then 100 and finally 166 Mhz processor over the versions. As well as 8 Mb of RAM for a rendering of 60 million pixels in 496x384 and two Yamaha 64-channel sound processors. At the time of its release, it was the most powerful arcade system on the market, with a capacity of over one million polygons per second and games like Virtua Fighter 3, Sega Rally 2 end Daytona USA 2
